segments.text: Mark , you really did a good job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You must have spent much time on the project .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I have a great team working with me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your project made much profit for the company . And the board of directors decided to give you a bonus .
segments.speaker: S1
